resources.string:
Prevent stunting with early 
detection and growth 
monitoring for your child's 
health and a brighter future
Your child is in good nutritional health,\ncontinue maintaining a balanced diet.
* Results are predictive and not a medical diagnosis. Consult a healthcare provider for accurate evaluation.
- Ensure the child receives a balanced diet for optimal growth. \n- Engage in regular exercise, maintain good posture, get enough sleep, and eat nutritious meals daily.
- Provide healthy meals with complete nutrition and appealing presentation. \n- Teach the importance of a balanced diet to support the child\'s growth.
- Monitor the child\'s nutritional status to prevent stunting and obesity. \n- Consult a doctor. Prevent stunting through early education and action.
- Fulfill the child\'s nutritional needs, encourage regular exercise. \n- Consult a doctor. Consistently provide nutritious meals and discuss supplements with a healthcare provider.
